product_name: florence by millsSurfing Under The Eyes Hydrating Treatment Gel Pads
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSurf's up on florence by mills Surfing Under The Eyes Hydrating Treatment Gel Pads. They deliver a surge of hydrolyzed hyaluronic acid to help hydrate and visibly plump, while a sustainably sourced blend of adaptogen and survivalist plants help revive skin's natural moisture barrier.
details: DetailsBenefitsSuper charged treatment to hydrate under eyesProvides a visible plumping effect to the skinHelps strengthen skin's natural barrier functionÂ Includes 15 pair of gel padsKey IngredientsHydrolyzed Hyaluronic acid features a low molecular weight that penetrates deeper into the epidermis (or surface layers of skin) to help hydrate & visibly plump skinAdaptogen & survivalist plants helps strengthen skin's natural barrier function, restore balance to stressed skin and improve hydrationItem 2604153How To UsePlace a pair of waves under the eyes. Leave on for 10-15 minutes. Use 2-3 times a week.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Carrageenan, Butylene Glycol, Acanthopanax Senticosus (Eleuthero) Root Extract, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Allantoin, Inonotus Obliquus (Mushroom) Extract, Rhaponticum Uniflorum Root Extract, Rhodiola Rosea Extract, Pinus Sylvestris Leaf Extract, Selaginella Lepidophylla Extract, Illicium Verum (Anise) Fruit Extract, Arginine, Dextrin, Ceratonia Siliqua (Carob) Gum, Cyamopsis Tetragonoloba (Guar) Gum, Cyclodextrin, Ethyl Hexanediol, Hexylene Glycol, Calcium Chloride, Pentylene Glycol, Propanediol, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Cellulose Gum, Potassium Chloride, Sucrose, Chlorphenesin, Hydroxyacetophenone, Betaine, 1,2-Hexanediol, Calcium Lactate, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Trehalose, Ethylhexylglycerin, Caprylyl Glycol, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Sodium Phytate, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Silica, Polyglyceryl-10 Oleate, Ultramarines (CI 77007), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891).
how_to_use: Place a pair of waves under the eyes. Leave on for 10-15 minutes. Use 2-3 times a week.

reviews.headline: Amazing!
reviews.comments: These are seriously the best and most moisturizing eye patches ever! They feel so light and natural on the face. Plenty come in the package making it a nice addition to a morning or night skincare routine. I would definitely recommend this great product!

reviews.headline: Feels amazing!!
reviews.comments: These eye masks are very hydrating and they feel great under my eyes. The color and shape is also super cute.

reviews.headline: So hydrating
reviews.comments: I love this product so much its so hydrating and its so calming and very sensitive on the skin .I love it i would recommend this if you want to feel hydrated and gentle on skin.ðŸ’œðŸ’œðŸ’œ i would repurchase this !

reviews.headline: not my fav
reviews.comments:
I have the other florence by mills eye pads and I love them, these however are more slimy and have a weirder shape to them
and for some reason my eye started stinging while using them I think because there was so much serum on them it got in my eyeâ€¦but still the other 2 colors the green & purple ones I havent had any of those issues with!

reviews.headline: My Fav
reviews.comments: I tried this when i got a set for Christmas and I LOVE IT the best eye masks EVER they feel so soft on my skin while its on and it sticks great! If ur thinking about geting this (GET IT)

reviews.headline: Allergic reaction
reviews.comments: Super sad wanted these to work, had an allergic reaction and dried out my under eyes. Make sure you read the ingredients before hand just to make sure you arent allergic to any of the items listed.

reviews.headline: Love them! ðŸ’™
reviews.comments: The pads were tricky for me to separate (but it is also my first time using under eye patches, so it could just be me). However, they felt great once they were on my face! Once I took them off, I could see and feel the difference they made. Definitely recommend!

reviews.headline: Slayyy
reviews.comments: Yasss

reviews.headline: Slayyy
reviews.comments: Yasss

reviews.headline: Florence by Mills Hydrating Pads
reviews.comments: Indifferent. Kept slipping down. Didn't notice a difference in my under eye area but felt nice while on.

reviews.headline: Cloud 9
reviews.comments: Love the ease of application & the feel of the pads soaking in

reviews.headline: Still unsure about this product
reviews.comments: Got this to use on both my upper eyelid and under eye area. The first time I used them they were great. Then I used them again recently and my skin started to burn. So I'm not sure what to think of them just yet.

reviews.headline: Soothing
reviews.comments: These feel amazing!

reviews.headline: Solid Eye Gel Pads
reviews.comments: Siper hydrating gel pads! I usually keep mine in the fridge. They are perfect for a skincare self care night. All this said, I do notice a huge noticeable difference after use.

reviews.headline: Allergic and residue
reviews.comments: they are cooling and have a slight tingle. They seem to have a puff effect, but later I realized it was a residual layer of the goop from the eye masks which peels/rolls off the face, sort of like a hair gel. Later I saw a dark red mark under one eye.

reviews.headline: Love this
reviews.comments: I would definitely repurchase this. It feels so hydrating. My akin is a little sensitive so it did tingle at first but then t felt amazing

reviews.headline: Feels nice
reviews.comments: They're cool when you apply them and if you need to leave them on longer than 15 minutes they don't irritate your eyes or skin. They feel nice on the skin. I also notice more hydration. I use them on my eyes and my laugh lines 3-4 times a week.

reviews.headline: Wow!
reviews.comments: I have severe bags and dark circles under my eyes. Some is my heritage and some is my age (61). I bought these for hydration. I ise eye serums and creams but sometimes i just need an extra boost of hydration. I put these on before bed and left them on for 10 minutes.  After removing tge pads, I patted the remaining gel into my undereye area. The next morning i woke up to eyes that looked 10-15 years younger. My undereyes looked depuffed, smoother and brighter. Amazing results! I bought these in a whim because they were in sale. I am so happy with the results, I'll buy again and again. So happy that I took a chance.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again and again!
reviews.comments:
Millie did it again! 
I got this product 2 weeks ago. I used it that night and I loved it! My eyes were puffed up. (Because of cat fur) And the puffiness was gone within 15 minutes! They left my eyes feeling soft and hydrated! I would 100% buy this again!

reviews.headline: Awesome for under eye hydration
reviews.comments: I love these. They stay put and don't fall down which has happened to me with other ones. They hydrate under my eye. I would highly recommend them.

media.headline: I love this product!

faceoff_positive.comments:
I was part of the FlorencePanel and received a free sample in exchange for my honest review.

I love the under eye gel pad lines from Florence by mils. This was my first time trying Surfing Under the Eyes. I have sensitive skin so they did tingle a bit at first but it was temporary. It was likely because I had just washed my face before applying them. I've never had an acne breakout from using them. They don't have a strong smell and are easy to apply. I like to store mine in the fridge for an hour or so before applying so they're extra cool on my skin. They give an extra dose of moisture to my skin, so a must have for dry winter season!
faceoff_positive.headline: Great for dry skin! Store in the fridge for an extra chill!

faceoff_negative.comments: #FLORENCEPANEL Honestly, I really like how hydrating this felt under my eyes. It was very cool and made my eyes brighter in 20 mintues. It went away after that but when I woke up the next day , I really saw a difference. My eye-bag were less obvious. I didnt like how they were so easy to move though. One touch and they were like moving around all over. It was also kinda too wet? In some way. But I liked how it was cold and a depuffer.
faceoff_negative.headline: #FLORENCEPANEL
